title: FS: T201 Rucker / Daubert PSA 2 - $30 ppd
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: T201 Rucker / Daubert PSA 2 - $30 ppd
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Up for sale is the pictured T201 Rucker / Daubert - card is graded a PSA 2.  Looks pretty solid for the grade, the only real wear I see is where the fold in the card is.  Corners are in decent shape and I'm not seeing any creases.

$30 and the card is yours.  PM or email to [url]scooter0729@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks for looking,
Scott
